Viera Transportation Management Association
Viera Transportation Management Association
Contact Us
Fairway Management of Brevard, Inc.
1331 Bedford Drive, Suite 103
Melbourne, FL 32940
Phone:  (321) 777-7575
Email:
tomdillon@fairwaymgmt.com
Thomas Dillon, CAM
Website:
https://www.fairwaymgmt.com/communities
Board of Directors
Eva M. Rey, President
Rachel Pringle, Vice President
Paul Martell, Treasurer
Diane Briggs, Secretary
MaryEllen McKibben, Director at Large
Governing Documents
Articles of Incorporation
By-Laws
The Viera Transportation Management Association (TMA) was created to actively work with public agencies to provide for mass transit facilities, van pools, park and ride, ride sharing, variable work hour, flex time, telecommuting or other programs to reduce automobile usage.
TMA owns and operates the Viera Park and Ride lot located at 5545 Porada Drive in Viera.
Upcoming Meetings

Viera Resident Orientation
Addison Village Club
8150 Stadium Parkway, Viera, FL, United States
Our Resident Orientation program is a two-hour class developed to inform new Viera residents a little bit about the history of Viera, the governance structure here, and the various governing entities, including who is responsible for what. The class also delves into environmental issues such as Florida Friendly landscaping and stormwater runoff. Finally, we discuss…

Home
»
Who We Are
»
Board of Directors
Board of Directors
The CVCA Board of Directors is responsible for the affairs of the Community Association including its administration, management, operation, regulation, care, maintenance, repair, restoration, replacement, preservation and protection of the common areas. The Board is also responsible for preparing and adopting annual budgets, setting and collecting assessments, ensuring the care and upkeep of the common areas, making and amending any rules or policies necessary for the operation of the Association, entering into contracts and enforcing the Community Declaration.
Currently, the Community Association is under Class “B” (Developer) control and all Board members are appointed by the Community Declarant (The Viera Company). Your current CVCA Board members are:
Eva M. Rey, President
Vice President of Community Management & Communications
The Viera Company
Mark J. Boyd, Vice-President/Secretary
Associate Corporate Counsel
The Viera Company
Shawn J. O’Keefe, Treasurer
Senior Accountant
The Viera Company

Management
Management
Management of the day-to-day operations of CVCA such as the financial management, infrastructure maintenance and administrative duties are performed by a contracted, professional manager. Subject to Board supervision, the manager is authorized to perform many of the duties of the Board and with the same powers granted to the Board through its Bylaws and Declaration. Some of these duties include, but are not limited to, the following:
Covenant Enforcement
Preparation of Annual Budgets
Assessment Billing / Collection
Architectural Modification Approval
Preparation of Financial Statements
Contract Management
Maintenance / Janitorial
Procurement / Bids
Complaint Resolution
For CVCA, Fairway Management of Brevard, Inc. (Fairway) has been hired to manage the day-to-day affairs of the CVCA master association. However, each Neighborhood/District association also hires its own management company. Please check your neighborhood page for more information on your specific Neighborhood/District Association Community Association Manager (CAM).
For any CVCA question or concern, Fairway should be your first point of contact for assistance. Visit the "Contact Us" page for Fairway's contact information or click
here
for more information on Fairway Management.
